messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

user creation on domain thursday pm hello please create infra per please log separate ad creation assign queue thank best regards senior engineer thursday pm re then thanks kind regards discipline lead re hello order connect connect infra after according both ad accounts infra right thank best regards senior engineer thursday pm re cannot even connect machine thank kind regards discipline lead re hi ad nor provided credentials possible create thank kind regards discipline lead hello order connect mentioned ad infra accounts please let provided ad accounts connecting thank best regards senior engineer hi please let remotely machine requirements order connect requirement next provide please action possible thank kind regards discipline lead re hi wrong rollback occurred everything appears let run rollback procedure connect remote machine backup existing site by copying renewals directory location note two versions machine find site renewals press stop button command prompt type cd install rollback restore files site examine output rollback script errors copy errors occur attempt recopy file because file locked by run command site renewals browser navigate again hopefully won precaution whilst out thanks regards hi how told next holiday since working good session rollback needed please let thank kind regards discipline lead
